June 2006 - August 2006 Expertise Research Interests Dr. Ranjan is primarily interested in the development of efficient algorithms and bioinformatics tools for solving biologically important problems. The scholar's more general research and teaching interests are in efficient data structure and algorithm design and analysis, computational complexity theory, parallel computation, discrete mathematics, and optimization and approximation Select Publications Articles Biswas, A., Ranjan, D., Zubair, M., Zeil, S., Al Nasr, K. and He, J.
